body:
;With CTE As (
    Select  OctoEventID, EventDate, EventType, EventDDL, EventXML, DatabaseName, SchemaName, ObjectName, HostName
          , IPAddress, ProgramName, LoginName, CommitNo, IsSend
          , ROW_NUMBER() Over (Partition By ObjectName Order By OctoEventID Desc) As rn
    From    Octo_Audits.dbo.DDLEvents
    Where   EventDate >= '2025-09-22 00:00:00.000' And  DatabaseName = DB_NAME()
)
Select  * From  CTE Where   CTE.rn = 1 Order By CTE.OctoEventID Desc;
